betterquesting:10.desc:8:
If one type of botanical stone transmutation was embedded with the remains of a powerful recursive material, one can assume that the other type of botanical stone transmutation would would too.
Well, I was correct. Both types of Orechid hold secrets. This one, though, Etherium, does not look immediately useful, compared with its counterpart. Probably it is because I lack the knowledge to use it, but who knows, maybe it was put there for other purposes altogether.
